entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
